tool.name: Gene-motif matrix
tool.description: Script to create csv formatted gene vs TF matrix from a filtered gff file. GFF file can contain just Positive or Just neagtive strand TFBS. Has two types of matrix produced: (Matrix type = 0) resence/Abscence with only 1 and 0s. (Matrix type = 1) counts of TFs with numbers 1,3,5 etc.
